name: Medius
tagline: Efficiency and automation is our passion!
description: Founded in 2001, Medius has grown steadily and now serves more than 2,000 customers worldwide processing in excess of 52 million invoices annually, with high density in the retail and manufacturing sectors. Medius currently employs over 220 AP invoice automation experts working from offices in Sweden (HQ), the United States, Australia, Denmark, the Netherlands, Norway, Poland and Malaysia.
